categories.name: Coding
categories.description: Prompts for debugging, code generation, refactoring, and software development
prompts: Identify the bug in the following code snippet: [insert code here]. Explain why it fails and provide a fix.
I'm getting an error [error message] in [language/framework]. What likely causes it and how can I fix it?
Refactor the following [language] code to improve readability and performance: [insert code].
Implement [algorithm or function] in [language] that [does X requirement].
Convert this code from [Language A] to [Language B]: [insert code].
Write unit tests for the following function using [testing framework]: [insert function code].
Explain what this code snippet does line by line: [insert code].
Optimize the following code for speed and memory usage: [insert code].
Design a basic software component for [purpose] and explain your design decisions.
Outline a high-level system architecture for a [type of application], including its key components and interactions.
Review the following code and suggest improvements or potential bugs: [insert code].
Document the function [function name] in [language], explaining its purpose, parameters, and return values.

categories.name: Writing
categories.description: Blog posts, emails, creative fiction, copywriting, and content creation
prompts: Write a blog post outline about [topic] targeted at [audience].
Draft a friendly yet professional email to [recipient] about [subject].
Write a short story in the [genre] genre about [brief scenario].
Rewrite the following text in a more engaging tone: [insert text].
Compose a persuasive product description for [product], highlighting its key benefits.
Generate a catchy headline for an article about [topic].
Produce an engaging introduction paragraph for an article about [topic].
Write a strong conclusion for an essay about [topic] that reinforces the main points.
Provide five creative content ideas for a blog or video on [theme].

categories.name: Business
categories.description: Proposals, analysis, strategy, presentations, and professional documents
prompts: Write a mission statement for a [type of business] that highlights its core values and goals.
Outline a basic business plan for a [industry] startup idea, covering target market, revenue model, and operations.
Generate a SWOT analysis for [company or product], including strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats.
Draft a professional project proposal to convince stakeholders to support [initiative or project].
Provide five strategies to improve [aspect, e.g. employee satisfaction or customer retention] in a small business.
Summarize the key differences between [Strategy A] and [Strategy B] for business growth.
Create an executive summary for a report on [business topic].
List the essential steps to manage a successful project rollout in [domain].

categories.name: Research
categories.description: Summarization, data analysis, literature reviews, and academic work
prompts: Summarize the main findings of a research article about [topic] in plain language.
Perform a brief literature review on [topic] and list five key sources with their insights.
Given the following data or results [provide data summary], what patterns or insights can you identify?
Generate three research questions related to [topic] that could be explored further.
Suggest an appropriate methodology to study the research question: [research question].
Assess the credibility of [source or claim] and explain your reasoning.
Format the following reference information into APA style: [details of source].

categories.name: Creative
categories.description: Image generation prompts, story ideas, artistic concepts, and brainstorming
prompts: Come up with a captivating story idea about [scenario or theme].
Write a vivid description of a [place or scene] to set the stage in a story.
Brainstorm five unusual creative uses for [everyday object].
Design a fictional world where [some condition holds], describing its key features and rules.
Create a detailed character profile for a [character role] including background, personality, and goals.
Brainstorm a creative concept for an art project that combines [concept1] and [concept2].
A majestic castle floating in the clouds at sunrise, digital art, by Hayao Miyazaki and Salvador DalÃ­, highly detailed.
A bustling futuristic city street at night, illuminated by neon signs and flying vehicles, cinematic high-contrast scene.
Propose an unusual plot twist for a mystery story involving [element].
List five imaginative themes for a fantasy art series.

categories.name: Productivity
categories.description: Task management, planning, organization, and workflow optimization
prompts: Organize my to-do list [list of tasks] into a prioritized schedule for the week.
Help me break down a large project [describe project] into smaller, manageable tasks.
Suggest tips to eliminate distractions while working from home.
Design a morning routine to boost productivity for someone who [description of situation or role].
Prioritize the following tasks using the Eisenhower matrix: [list of tasks].
Create a simple system to track habits and progress toward personal goals.

categories.name: Education
categories.description: Lesson plans, explanations, tutoring, and learning assistance
prompts: Create a lesson plan for teaching [topic] to [grade level or audience], including objectives and activities.
Explain [complex concept] in simple terms so that a [target age or level] student can understand.
Generate five practice questions (with answers) to test understanding of [topic].
Provide an example to illustrate how [concept] works in real life.
Suggest a strategy to help a student struggling with [subject or concept].
Outline a four-week study plan to learn [topic] from basics to advanced.
Devise a fun interactive activity or experiment to demonstrate [concept].
Summarize the key points of [historical event or scientific theory] for a quick review.

categories.name: Marketing
categories.description: Ad copy, SEO, social media, campaigns, and brand strategy
prompts: Write a compelling Facebook ad copy for [product/service] targeting [audience].
Generate three catchy taglines for a brand of [product] that emphasize its unique value.
Outline a basic social media campaign strategy for launching [new product or service].
Suggest five SEO keyword phrases related to [business/topic] and how to incorporate them into a blog post.
Draft a friendly email newsletter introduction promoting [a special offer or event].
Describe a unique selling proposition (USP) for [business or product] that sets it apart from competitors.
Propose a creative influencer marketing idea to boost brand awareness for [brand or product].

models.name: OpenAI GPT-5 series and reasoning models
GPT-5
prompts: Analyze the pros and cons of implementing a universal basic income policy, considering economic and social perspectives.
Draft a short science fiction story about the first human born on Mars and the challenges they face.
Solve this math word problem step by step: [problem description].
Explain the concept of quantum computing and its potential impact in simple terms.
Design a comprehensive plan to reduce carbon emissions for a mid-sized city.
Given a long paragraph of text [insert text], extract the key points and present them as bullet items.
Write a piece of code in [language] that demonstrates how to use [specific feature or library], including comments explaining each step.
Take the role of a career counselor and provide advice for someone transitioning from [Field A] to [Field B].

models.name: GPT-5.1
prompts: Solve this complex riddle or puzzle: [puzzle description].
Perform an in-depth literary analysis of the themes and symbols in [literary work].
Optimize the following Python code for speed and clarity: [insert code snippet].
Translate a technical document from English to Spanish, ensuring accurate use of technical terminology.
Provide a step-by-step explanation for deriving the formula for [scientific or mathematical concept].

models.name: GPT-5.2
prompts: Review the logic of this argument [insert argument text] and identify any fallacies or flaws.
Brainstorm innovative use cases for AI in the healthcare industry and discuss potential challenges for each.
Summarize the plot of [classic literature title] and explain its main moral or lesson.
Write a formal proof or thorough explanation for the statement: [insert mathematical or logical statement].
Compose a heartfelt letter of recommendation for an employee who excelled in [skill or project].
Critique a proposed software architecture for [system description], noting strengths and potential issues.
Emulate the style of Shakespeare to write a sonnet about modern technology.

models.name: o3
prompts: Break down the steps to solve the equation: [mathematical equation or problem].
If X > Y and Y > Z, what can we deduce about the relationship between X and Z? Explain your reasoning.
Outline a decision tree to help determine whether a person should rent or buy a house, based on financial and personal factors.
Explain why the sky is blue in a way a 10-year-old could understand.

models.name: o4-mini
prompts: What is the capital of [Country] and one interesting fact about it?
Translate the phrase "Good morning, how are you?" into French.
Calculate the total of 5 + 7 * 2 - 3, explaining the order of operations.

models.name: Claude Opus 4
prompts: Summarize a 10-page document about [topic] into a few paragraphs highlighting the key points.
Draft a diplomatic letter responding to a customer complaint about [issue], maintaining a polite and understanding tone.
Explain the philosophical differences between the theories of [Philosopher A] and [Philosopher B].
Outline a comprehensive training program for new employees at a [industry] company.
Imagine and describe a day in the life of an AI assistant in the year 2035.
Discuss the ethical considerations of using AI in [specific domain], providing balanced arguments.

models.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
prompts: Write a sonnet about the value of lifelong learning.
Provide a friendly explanation of how to cook [dish] for someone new to cooking.
Brainstorm five ideas for a community project to improve [aspect of local area].
Give advice to someone who feels nervous about public speaking.
Convert the following passage into a brief bullet-point summary: [insert text].
Role-play as a personal fitness coach and give tips and encouragement for staying motivated.
Compare and contrast solar energy and wind energy as sustainable power sources.
Tell a short children's story that teaches a lesson about honesty.
Come up with a catchy slogan for a charity event focused on [cause].
Explain the concept of [basic science concept] using a fun analogy.
Draft a short thank-you note to a mentor, expressing sincere appreciation.
List strategies to improve concentration while studying for exams.

models.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
prompts: Compose a haiku about the changing seasons.
List three quick tips for maintaining good mental health.
Give a one-sentence definition of [obscure term].
Translate 'Good evening' into Japanese and Chinese.

models.name: Gemini 3 Pro
prompts: Generate a marketing plan for launching a new mobile app in the finance sector.
Outline the steps needed to train an AI model on a custom dataset.
Write a news article summary covering who, what, when, where, and why for [recent event].
Create a dialogue in Spanish where a tourist asks for directions to a famous landmark and a local provides help.
Explain how to balance a chemical equation, providing an example in the explanation.

models.name: Gemini 3 Flash
prompts: Define [technical term] in one sentence.
List five synonyms for the word "[word]".
What's 72 divided by 8? Provide just the result.
Give a quick tip for improving battery life on a smartphone.

models.name: Gemini 3 Deep Think
prompts: Solve this logic puzzle step by step: [describe puzzle].
Analyze the impact of social media on teenagers' mental health, mentioning key factors and considerations.
Evaluate the feasibility of establishing a colony on the Moon by 2040, considering technological and economic aspects.

models.name: Grok 3
prompts: Who wrote the novel "1984" and in which year was it published?
Solve 5 + 7 * 2 / 2 - 3, showing each step of your calculation.

models.name: Grok 4
prompts: Explain the significance of Einstein's theory of relativity in modern physics.
Write a brief dialogue between two characters debating the merits and risks of AI in society.
Given a chessboard state in FEN format [insert FEN], determine which side has an advantage and explain why.
Provide a critical review of a movie of your choice, focusing on its themes and cinematography.

models.name: Grok 4 Heavy
prompts: Translate the following French text into English while preserving its tone: [insert French text].
Given two datasets with different formats, suggest a method to integrate and analyze them together.

models.name: Llama 4
prompts: Summarize the advantages of using open-source AI models in commercial projects.
Write a short story about a llama who becomes a software developer, blending humor and insight.
Explain the steps for a beginner to contribute to an open-source project on GitHub.

models.name: Mistral Large 3
prompts: Provide a brief explanation of [concept] in French, then translate it to English.
List five key considerations when designing a mobile app's user interface.
